description.lang: The product is a voice alert and notification device. Prerecorded voice sounds can be stored into its memory and played back through gateway commands. For example, when emailarrives, the audio sound youve got mail can be heard from its speaker.It also has a separate piezoelectric siren to emit a deafening sound when activated under emergency.In addition, the built in digital temperature sensor and humidity sensor reports environmental condition to the controller.
Siren alarm period can be set 10~600 seconds.
Siren alarm period can be set 10~600 seconds.
Temperature/Humidity Auto Report period can be set 1~1440 minutes
Temperature/Humidity Auto Report period can be set 1~1440 minutes
